name: John's Animated Weirdness SANDBOX
description:
Have you ever wanted to spawn infinite Johns'? or Noahs'? or maybe even Masons'?  Well now you can in the all new JOHN'S ANIMATED WEIRDNESS SANDBOX!

In this wacky ass game, you can spawn as many JAW characters or objects as you'd like, drag them around, and much more! You can do this all in many different worlds, that's also related to JAW!

This game can also be found on Newgrounds: [insert NG link here]

SPAWNING KEYS:

ESC - Back to Main Menu

1 - Spawn John(s).

minus - Delete all Objects

PROP SPAWNING KEYS:

W+1 - Spawns AR-15

W+2 - Spawns Glock-20SF

W+3 - Spawns Kitchen Knife

CUSTOMIZING JOHN KEYS:

Please Note:

Game will glitch if there are Neutral Johns on the playground when you spawn John with an emotion.

The trench coat skins only work on Neutral John.

1+H - Spawns Happy John

1+S  - Spawns Sad John

1+M - Spawns Mad/Angry John

Q (mouse over John) - Mirrors John

T  -  Spawns John with Trench Coat

C  - Spawns John with Trench Coat + Sunglasses

TIP:

If you take a weapon and drag it somewhere and right-click, it will freeze it in place!

CREDITS IN README.TXT
